K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:232b-8: de yang gdugs rnams smin bya'i don te rmongs pa rnams ni bde ba'i don du rgyal ba'i dam tshig go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:232b-9: rin chen 'byung ba sdug 'phongs rnams kyi 'gyur te padma 'dzin pa chags can rnams kyis chags pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:232b-10: bgegs rnams gzhom pa'i don nyid du ni phyag gi padmar ral gri 'dzin pa'i don yod grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:232b-11: gang zhig zhe sdang las ni sna tshogs yum ste de nyid dus mtha'i me mtshungs mkha' 'gro ma ru 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:232b-12: gti mug las ni spyan mar brjod de mchog gi snying rjes nga rgyal rgyu las m'a ma k'i ru gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:232b-13: 'dod chags las ni gos dkar mor gsungs yon tan ma lus gter gyur phrag dog nyid las sgrol ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233a-0: 'di nyid gnyis po dag ni sna tshogs gzugs te yul dang @233a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233a-1: yul can 'di dag thams cad gzhan du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233a-2: sbyin pa la sogs drug bzhi'i rnam pa bde mnyam 'bras bu ster bde ba de rnams nus ma bcu ru gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233a-3: de rnams thabs ni byang sems mchog tu dag pas gang ba'i bum pa rnam pa bcu po rnams su 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233a-4: bdud dang nyon mongs nges par zad pa 'dod lha bde byed dag ste rdo rje'i tshogs ni ljon pa sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233a-5: phyag rgya drug ni stong pa drug ste srid gsum skyed par byed pa shes dang shes bya gcig pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233a-6: gang gis nges par rigs kyi gzugs su gyur pa rtsom pa de la gzugs ni chen por gsungs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233a-7: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu bcom par gyur pa gang yin de ni tshor ba chen por gsungs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233a-8: 'khor ba'i 'du shes bcom par gyur pa gang yin de ni rdo rje chen po'i 'du shes nyid du gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233a-9: gang du 'khor ba'i 'phel ba bcom par gyur pa gang yin de ni rdo rje'i 'du byed kho na'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233a-10: gnyid la sogs pa'i gnas skabs bcom par gyur pa gang yin de ni rnam par shes par gsungs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233a-11: mi shes pa yi dngos po bcom par gyur pa gang yin de ni thub pa'i ye shes nyid du gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233a-12: de rnams rnam par snang mdzad la sogs rgyal mchog dam pa rnams te rnam pa drug ni rigs drug go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233a-13: gzhan yang khams drug dbye ba rnams ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' bzhi rnams las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233a-14: gti mug mtha' dag bcom par gyur pa gang yin de ni spyan ma yin te de nyid sa ru gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233b-0: nga rgyal mtha' dag bcom @233b par gyur pa gang yin rnams ni m'a ma k'i ste de nyid chu ru gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233b-1: 'dod chags mtha' dag bcom par gyur pa gang yin rnams ni gos dkar mo ste de nyid me ru gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233b-2: phrag dog mtha' dag bcom par gyur pa gang yin rnams ni sgrol ma nyid de de nyid rlung du gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233b-3: zhe sdang mtha' dag bcom par gyur pa gang yin rnams ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste mkha'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233b-4: ser sna mtha' dag bcom par gyur pa gang yin rnams ni sna tshogs yum ste mi 'gyur bde ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233b-5: yid kyis nam mkhar nges par gzugs mthong ba ste ma mthong ba nyid ba gang yin de ni mig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233b-6: ring nas sgra brjod rab tu gsal bar thos par gyur pa 'di ni rgyal ba yi ni rna chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233b-7: dri rnams thams cad 'dzin pa nyid de mchog tu bde bar gyur pa de ni khyab bdag dam pa'i sna //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233b-8: rang gi zla bzang bdud rtsi rtag tu myangs pas yang dag bde ba ster ba gang yin de ni lce //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233b-9: rdo rje reg bya kun nas rgyun du 'phrog pa de ni rdo rje lus kyi dbang por 'gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233b-10: thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa chos te de las bde ba mnyam par zhugs pa gang yin de ni yid; ;drug po 'di rnams dbye bas phye na yul dang yul can dag ste byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233b-11: gzugs sogs 'di rnams rgyal ba mchog gi yul te rnam pa drug rnams gzugs brnyan bzhin du sprul pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:233b-12: dang zhing mi skye mi 'gag pa dang mchog tu bde ba 'dzag med rnyog med ye shes go bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234a-0: 'gro ba gzhan gyis bzung bar mi nus khams gsum kun gyi dbang po'i @234a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234a-1: sgo yis yang dag go ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234a-2: phung po lnga yi rang bzhin rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga nyid du snying rje yis ni bzhugs gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234a-3: nges pa bral dang bsod nams ma yin bsags pa'i sems can ma lus smin par bya ba'i don du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234a-4: gtsang ma'i gnas sogs rnams su bcom ldan 'das nyid bzhugs pa nyan thos gang zhig rnams kyi don du'o /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234a-5: ae wam rnam par gang bzhugs mchog gi nges pa dang ldan ma lus gang du dgod pa'i don du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234a-6: sems can rnams ni smin par bya ba'i don du sku gsung thugs kyi dbye bas bzhugs pa rnam pa gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234a-7: nges par rdo rje can rnams phyi dang nang dang gzhan gyi dus rnams kun la rtag par rab byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234a-8: phyi rol rnams la sna tshogs ma ru 'gyur te lus la rlung gis rab tu rgyu ba gang zhig rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234a-9: sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang gtso bo gang zhig rdo rje btsun mo'i bha gar rab tu yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234a-10: gzhan ni gang zhig sgra la sogs pa'i yul gyur rnams la sems mi 'gro dang de bzhin de kho na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234a-11: gang zhig ae wam yi ger zhugs kyang mchog tu bde ba'i go 'phang las ni sku gsung thugs bzhugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234a-12: rdo rje can nyid gcig la gsum gyi dbye bar 'gyur ba yul dang yul can khams kyis bskor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234b-0: srid pa gsum gyi sems can du ma rnams kyi don phyir dus gsum bde gshegs gnas gsum @234b rnams pa bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234b-1: rgyud rnams su ni 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya'i tshig rnams 'di ltar bdag gis shes pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234b-2: mgo mgrin snying ga lte ba gsang ba rnams kyi padmar zla ba zhu ba rdo rje can gyi dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234b-3: mchog gi padma de la thig le gsum gyis thar par gshegs pa rdo rje btsun mo'i bha gar brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234b-4: sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu zhugs pa de 'dir bcom ldan 'das su rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234b-5: gcig ni du mar mthong ste smon lam yon tan dbang las zhi dang chags pa la sogs rang bzhin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234b-6: 'khor lo la gnas skye ba snga ma nyid kyi bag chags stobs gyur rnams kyi sems las byung ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234b-7: don gcig la ni ma lus gsung rnams srog chags rnams kyi rang rang bsam pa dang sbyar rab tu 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234b-8: 'khor lo la gnas khyim na gnas pa rnams kyi bsod nams don du bsod snyoms mdzad du gshegs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234b-9: dud 'gro yi dvags lha min brang 'gro lha dang 'phags pa mi dang du 'bod la sogs pa rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234b-10: 'das dang ma byon da ltar byung ba rnam pa gsum du rtag par bden pa'i chos rnams gsungs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234b-11: srid gsum ma lus rang rang skad rnams kyis ni lam la yang dag gnas par byed do gzhan gyis min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:234b-12: bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung 'di yin te lha skad rnams kyis 'byung ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235a-1: cad du ni nges par rdo rje can gyis rdo rje'i tshig rnams sbas pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235a-2: srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i don du dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyud du ma lus mngon su ma gsungs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235a-3: de phyir 'jig rten pa yi rgyud kyi bla ma ma lus ma tshang med pa 'jig rten las 'das pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235a-4: dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyud du rgyal ba mchog gi bdag po mngon par rjod byed zla bzang kye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235a-6: mi yi 'jig rten rnams su nyon mongs rnams bral dpal ldan bla ma gang dag rdo rje 'dzin bdag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235a-7: 'di man bka bsdu ba 'jam grags kyi gsung yin 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235a-8: de la nyes pa byed pa'i srog chags rnams ni nges par 'dir ni dmyal bar 'gyur te ngo mtshar med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235a-9: de mnyes pa yis bdag mnyes pa ste de la khro ba'i me chen byed na bdag la khro ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235a-10: sems can rnams la de yis bde mnyam 'bras bu'i thar ba ster bas phyag rgya mchod bya sras rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235a-11: dpal ldan bla ma'i zhabs bzang padmar dus gsum rnams la phyag mi 'tshal ba las ni sdig can gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235a-12: dus gsum rnams su sna tshogs me tog rnam pa mang pos mandal mi byed de las rmongs pa gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235a-13: myur bar bde ba ster ba'i bla ma skyo ba skyed pa gang yin gang zhig mnar med pa ru 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235b-0: shes rab ye shes thob pa gang ni mchog gi bla ma'i zhabs gang mi spong ba de nyams @235b pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235b-1: su zhig nyams na gang zhig rtsa gsum la gnas rlung rnams dpag med dus su gsod byed nyams pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235b-2: dpa' bo gang na mnyam dang mi mnyam lam du srog dang thur du rgyu ba'i rlung rnams gsod byed gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235b-3: sbyin bdag gang na dpal ldan bla ma rnams la rang lus bu dang chung ma la sogs gang 'bul rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235b-4: ngan pa gang na slu byed rang snying nyon mongs pa yi sems kyis 'gugs pa'i g-yo sgyu can rnams gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235b-5: dpal ldan chos kyi 'khor lo kha dog sna tshogs pa yi gdan de la ni sangs rgyas nyer bzhugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235b-6: lha mchog rnams kyis btud nas mi yi bdag po zla bas zhus pa lha dang mi yi bal ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235b-7: khong du chung nas sems can kun gyi don rgyur rgyud kyi rgyal po dang po'i sangs rgyas de nyid gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235b-8: de yang a'a li k'a li dang ldan bsdus pa'i rgyud snying nga yis nyi ma khyod la gtad de kye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235b-9: sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa las ni nga yis dus kyi 'khor lo me tog phreng ba 'dzin bsdebs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235b-10: padma dkar po khyod kyis bsngags pa rnams la nges par drang srong nyi ma'i shing rta yin 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235b-11: rdo rje'i tshig 'dzin 'di nyid brtan par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235b-12: 'di yis nyi ma dang bcas thub rigs rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin shes rab ye shes thob gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:235b-13: de ltar dus kyi 'khor lo'i drin gyis srid gsum la gnas sems can rnams kyang de ltar 'gyur bar shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236a-0: nyi ma khyod dam mi bdag phyi mar gyur pa'i srid par dus ky @236a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236a-2: bram ze'i rigs su skyes dag mi dbang grags pa bdag ni 'jam dbyangs nyid de bdag gi dga' ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236a-3: dpal ldan sgrol ma pad dkar mtha' dag yon tan gter gyur 'jig rten mgon po padma'i phyag mtshan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236a-4: autpal yi sdong po bdag gzhan snga ma'i srid pa thams cad ji lta ba bzhin nges par ltos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236a-5: bdag gzhan kun gyi srid pa snga ma'i autpal yi sdong bu ji lta ba bzhin mthong nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236a-6: nyi ma dang bcas thub dbang rnams kyis dbu rgyan bcas pa'i dbu yis rigs gcig zhabs kyi padma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236a-7: lag gnyis thal mo sbyar te btud nas smras pa thub pa'i rigs rnams mi bzad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236a-8: gdon phyir ye shes lam la mchog gi snying rje yis ni 'god par byed pa ston pa gcig pu kye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236a-9: bgres dang gzhon pa nyid kyang khyod de ma lus rgyal ba'i sras dang dang po'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236a-10: bud med dang 'dus pa dang tshangs par spyod dang mchog gi snying rjes 'jig rten gnyen dang gshin rje'i gshed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236a-11: khyod ni zhi dang mchog gi mchog ste khyod nyid 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dang ni bdud kyi bdud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236a-12: grol ba yang ni khyod de 'gro ba smin bya'i don du srid pa 'dir 'jug pa yang grags pa khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236a-13: nyi ma bdag dang bram ze thub pa'i rigs rnams kun gyi zhabs kyi drung du phyag byas lhung pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236b-0: @236b [?] las can ma lus sgrol ba'i don rgyur dus kyi 'khor lo mtha' dag sa steng gsal por bsgrags par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236b-1: dpal ldan ka l'a pa ru nyi mtshungs rigs gcig rigs la sa yi bdag pos phyag byas pa yang khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236b-2: mi bzad 'khor bas 'jigs pas khyod kyi zhabs kyi padma la ni skyabs su lhag par mchis pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236b-3: dpyid zla tha chung nya yi mtshan mo 'das nas nyin mor rab tu ma zhugs pa yi dus nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236b-4: sna tshogs gtso bo'i byin gyi rlabs kyis nyi ma thub pa'i skye bor bcas pas phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236b-5: bdag gi sems kyi rdo rjes steng ma lus song bas sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i rgyur 'gyur ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236b-6: dus kyi 'khor lo'i drin gyis srid pa rnam gsum sems can rnams kyi don la 'gro bar byed par shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236b-7: mchog gi snying rje sems can kun gyi don rnams mdzad pa po yi rgyud kyi don rnams bstan mdzad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236b-8: rab mchog yon tan kun gyi gter ldan sras po padma dkar po nyid la bka' stsal gnang nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236b-9: rgyud kyi rgyal po mtha' dag tshangs pa nges par glegs bam la gnas byas pa 'di la 'jig rten gnyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236b-10: khyod kyis dang por nges par rgya cher 'grel pa gyis la de nas mchog gi go 'phang 'gro bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236b-11: steng na byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rnams kyis bdud kyi phyogs gyur rnams dang lha min ma lus rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:236b-12: mchog tu 'jigs mdzad mi yi 'jig rten phyogs mtshams la gnas khro rgyal btsun mor bcas pas srin po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:237a-1: tu ni gdengs ka'i dbang po gang zhig rnams kyis 'jigs byed ma rungs thams cad 'ching bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:237a-2: de rnams kun gyis nyin mtshan so so'i dus su 'jig rten mi shis ma lus kun nas skyong bar shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:237a-3: thabs dang shes rab gcig sbyor rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje de nyid rnam pa bcu drug ldan 'dus pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:237a-4: ma lus bsdus rgyud dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo rdo rje sems dpa' lhag pa'i lhar gyur ba de yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:237a-5: sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i rgyu ru rgyal ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa gang zhig bdag nyid kyis kyang bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:237a-6: bsod nams de yis sems can rnams kyis mi 'gyur mchog gi bde ba thob byed de la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:237a-7: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:237a-8: ye shes kyi le'u mdor bsdus pa ste le'u lnga pa'i rgyud kyi snying po'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:237a-9: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po le'u lnga pa las zab lam rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam par gtan la phab pa mdor bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi snying po zhes bya ba rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:237a-10: rgya gar gyi mkhan po shr'i bha dra bo dhi la sogs pa'i zhal snga nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:237a-11: bod kyi lo tstsha ba gyi jo bandhe zla ba'i 'od zer la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:237a-12: slad kyi rgya gar gyi pandi ta mkhas pa chen po sa manta shr'i dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:237a-13: sgra sgyur gyi lotstsha ba dge slong chos rab kyis bcos shing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:237b-3: 'gyur dman 'gyur bcos gnyis te 'gyur skyon brgyad dang bral ba'o /)/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:237b-4: dus 'khor bsdus rgyud kyi snying po 'di snye thang rin chen gling bla mas shod smad 'jang phu lha khang gi dpe khrod nas rnyed pa pan chen dpal ldan ye shes la gzigs su phul bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:237b-6: rigs ldan 'jam dpal grags pas dus 'khor bsdus rgyu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:237b-7: las kyang shin tu snying por bka' bsdu mdzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:237b-8: byang shambha lar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thams cad kyis kha ton du klog pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-005:237b-9: bod kyi bka' 'gyur gyi nang du ma tshud pa ngo mtshar bye ba'i 'byung gnas yin /
